title: Munich
description_short: The capital of the state of Bavaria
description: The capital of the state of Bavaria and one of Germany's largest cities, Munich owes much of its popularity as a tourism destination to its location on the outer edge of the beautiful Bavarian Alps.

title: Cologne
description_short: Cologne is another of those wonderful old German cities
description: Cologne is another of those wonderful old German cities that has managed to preserve its past for modern generations to enjoy.
text: Popular places:- Peterskirche, Frauenkirche, Michaelskirche, Marienplatz, Englischer Garten
